Mushfique Rahim (Pilot is getting worse with gloves too) 8.Rafique (Until next world cup) 9.Razzaque / Saqib 10.Sahadat 11.Rasel...or umm..Mash (Mash is a good bowler, but a less injury-prone bowler can serve better in the long run)
